title: Tengu reaver
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all tengu, see [list of tengu](/List_of_tengu "List of tengu").*

| tengu reaver Q [![Tengu reaver.png](/images/2/24/Tengu_reaver.png)](/File:Tengu_reaver.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                              | 56-114                                                                                                                                                                                               |

| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                              | 2067                                                                                                                                                                                                 |

| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                    | 16                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                              | 60                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Attack1                                                                                     | 27 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                    |
| Attack2                                                                                     | 11 ([peck](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                   |
| Attack3                                                                                     | 11 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                   |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                     | None                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                           | None                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                               | Land                                                                                                                                                                                                 |

| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                            | [Weapons & armour](/Category:Weapons_armour "Category:Weapons armour") [Starting equipment](/Item_usage "Item usage") [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors")                       |

|   |                                                                      |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An elite, ferocious tengu highly skilled with both steel and spells. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Tengu reavers** are the most dangerous [tengu](/List_of_tengu "List of tengu") opponents you can encounter. They are competent swordsmen and capable [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")-users which usually pelt you with powerful [bolt spells](/Bolt_spells "Bolt spells"), while you will find your own ranged attacks failing to hit due to their [repulsion](/Repel_Missiles "Repel Missiles"). They can be found in [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults") and [Depths](/Depths "Depths"), and are often found in the company of [Sojobo](/Sojobo "Sojobo").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                           |                                                     |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt") (3d21)             | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d26)       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold") (3d26)       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Corrosive Bolt](/Corrosive_Bolt "Corrosive Bolt") (3d24) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot5       | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d22) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- They can cast high damage spells of the 6 "main" elements. Unless you're resistant to everything, don't expect to get out of the fight unscathed. A 3d26 damage spell might not seem like a lot, but 1-2 good rolls can quickly turn things sour.
- They have low [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") for where they are found, so all sorts of [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") and hex [wands](/Wand "Wand") can work well.
- Repel Missiles can be [dispelled](/Dispel "Dispel"). This isn't very useful for the [wand of quicksilver](/Wand_of_quicksilver "Wand of quicksilver"), but [Yara's Violent Unravelling](/Yara%27s_Violent_Unravelling "Yara's Violent Unravelling") never misses and can damage the target and any adjacent foes.

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), tengu reavers had fast movement but did not have Repel Missiles.

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), tengu reavers could have one of three possible spell sets:

  - [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma") (3d26), [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") (3d27), and [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere")
  - [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt") (3d21), [Poisonous Cloud](/Poisonous_Cloud "Poisonous Cloud") (3d11), [Corrosive Bolt](/Corrosive_Bolt "Corrosive Bolt") (3d21), and [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere")
  - [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") (2d27), [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d22), and [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere")

- Tengu reavers were added in [0.13](/0.13 "0.13").
html:
Tengu reaver

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all tengu, see list of tengu.

tengu reaver Q 
HP 56-114
HD 17
XP 2067
Speed 10
AC 8
EV 16
Will 60
Attack1 27 (hit: plain)
Attack2 11 (peck: plain)
Attack3 11 (claw: plain)
Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type tengu, tengu
Flags Fighter
See invisible
Flying
Speaks
Warm-blooded
An elite, ferocious tengu highly skilled with both steel and spells.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Tengu reavers are the most dangerous tengu opponents you can encounter. They are competent swordsmen and capable Conjurations-users which usually pelt you with powerful bolt spells, while you will find your own ranged attacks failing to hit due to their repulsion. They can be found in the Vaults and Depths, and are often found in the company of Sojobo.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Venom Bolt (3d21) Wizard flag
Slot2 Bolt of Fire (3d26) Wizard flag
Slot3 Bolt of Cold (3d26) Wizard flag
Slot4 Corrosive Bolt (3d24) Wizard flag
Slot5 Lightning Bolt (3d22) Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • They can cast high damage spells of the 6 "main" elements. Unless you're resistant to everything, don't expect to get out of the fight unscathed. A 3d26 damage spell might not seem like a lot, but 1-2 good rolls can quickly turn things sour.
  • They have low willpower for where they are found, so all sorts of Hexes and hex wands can work well.
  • Repel Missiles can be dispelled. This isn't very useful for the wand of quicksilver, but Yara's Violent Unravelling never misses and can damage the target and any adjacent foes.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, tengu reavers had fast movement but did not have Repel Missiles.
  • Prior to 0.27, tengu reavers could have one of three possible spell sets:
    • Bolt of Magma (3d26), Fireball (3d27), and Iskenderun's Battlesphere
    • Venom Bolt (3d21), Poisonous Cloud (3d11), Corrosive Bolt (3d21), and Iskenderun's Battlesphere
    • Freezing Cloud (2d27), Lightning Bolt (3d22), and Iskenderun's Battlesphere
  • Tengu reavers were added in 0.13.

{{version031}}
{{list of | tengu}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Tengu reavers''' are the most dangerous [[list of tengu|tengu]] opponents you can encounter. They are competent swordsmen and capable [[Conjurations]]-users which usually pelt you with powerful [[bolt spells]], while you will find your own ranged attacks failing to hit due to their [[Repel Missiles|repulsion]]. They can be found in [[the Vaults]] and [[Depths]], and are often found in the company of [[Sojobo]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*They can cast high damage spells of the 6 "main" elements. Unless you're resistant to everything, don't expect to get out of the fight unscathed. A 3d26 damage spell might not seem like a lot, but 1-2 good rolls can quickly turn things sour.
*They have low [[willpower]] for where they are found, so all sorts of [[Hexes]] and hex [[wand]]s can work well.
*Repel Missiles can be [[dispel|dispelled]]. This isn't very useful for the [[wand of quicksilver]], but [[Yara's Violent Unravelling]] never misses and can damage the target and any adjacent foes.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], tengu reavers had fast movement but did not have Repel Missiles.
*Prior to [[0.27]], tengu reavers could have one of three possible spell sets:
**[[Bolt of Magma]] (3d26), [[Fireball]] (3d27), and [[Iskenderun's Battlesphere]]
**[[Venom Bolt]] (3d21), [[Poisonous Cloud]] (3d11), [[Corrosive Bolt]] (3d21), and [[Iskenderun's Battlesphere]]
**[[Freezing Cloud]] (2d27), [[Lightning Bolt]] (3d22), and [[Iskenderun's Battlesphere]]
*Tengu reavers were added in [[0.13]].
